meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ted Snelgrove Linda Holling Jason Benton Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2775.

td.p: Ted Snelgrove, a marketing manager originally from Minneapolis, Minnesota
Linda Holling, a substitute teacher from Santa Monica, California
Jason Benton, a teacher from Amenia, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $14,100)

tr.td: THE NEW $100 BILL
SCIENCE
10-LETTER WORDS
ART
THE 1995 GRAMMYS
"B" CITIES
